name: Guide: is my VPN working correctly

guide.title: Is my VPN connected to the right server location?
guide.subtitle: Test your geolocation on one of our 400+ worldwide servers in two super simple ways:

blocks.content: Enter a search term like “local weather” in your browser and see a real-time weather update for your current VPN location.
Sign in to your favorite app or streaming site
Traveling abroad and need to access content from back home?

content.content: Connect to the country server of your choice
Sign on to your favorite app or streaming site
